title: Charming 2BR/2BA Sunnyvale Condo - Available Now!
posting_body: - IF YOU ARE INTERESTED APPLY ASAP
-Newer Carpet in both bedrooms and storage room!
-Kitchen offers breakfast counter, gas range, built-in microwave,
-Refrigerator, dishwasher, range/oven and microwave and ample storage space
-Separate dining room accommodates a full size table and chairs
-Inside laundry room with full-size side-by-side washer/dryer
-Master bedroom offers built-in closet systems, mirrored wardrobes and en suite
-Second bedroom has large walk-in closet with built-in closet system
-Master bath with all tub/shower stall, granite counter top, fixtures and flooring
-Guest bath with granite counter top, fixtures and flooring
-Storage room with built-in shelves provide additional storage space
-Front door and back door entrances; back door leads to exterior one car parking garage
-Private balcony with tree shading for additional privacy.
Close to Hwy 101, Caltrain, VTA, downtown Sunnyvale, LinkedIn offices, future Apple offices, Google campuses and new Levi's 49er Stadium
-One detached garage #160, and one outside homeowner parking space (parking tag must be displayed)
